about_the_game:
It's a camping experience that is like a dream where you do things like hold BBQs with a beautiful naked woman, ride boats with her, and have sex with her!

Explanation of the Game:
Through realistic and high-quality 3D, you can enjoy a sense of immersion as if you are really there on a desert island with a beautiful woman.
You can act freely, such as by exploring the desert island and climbing its rocks and by playing hide-and-seek with a beautiful naked woman.

Method of Operation:
When you touch a cube on the island, an event occurs. The cube on the tent brings about a sexual event!
There are various events, such as changing between day and night, traveling the ocean in a boat, and enjoying a BBQ.


Persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content or themes that are appropriate only for adult.

Themes in this game include:
> Explicit consensual sex scenes
> Nakedness
> genitals
> lewd situations

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: VR Nudity Camping

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: It's just you and a beautiful woman on a desert island. You can do things like chase one another and camp out together!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Ukrainian*, Dutch*, Greek*, Swedish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Thai*, Czech*, Danish*, Turkish*, Norwegian*, Hungarian*, Finnish*, Bulgarian*, Vietnamese*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Polish*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
